attributes.action: Issue a Service Medal to Front Line Staff dealing with Covid-19.
attributes.additional_details:
As a British Army Soldier I was awarded a medal "For Campaign Service. I am proud to wear the medal as it reminds me of the service I gave, and the comrades I lost.
The devotion to duty and the compassion shown by Front Line Staff dealing with Covid-19 deserves a similar award. They are involved in a Campaign against this deadly virus.
The Staff given this award and their families would look back with pride on the service they gave and the comrades they lost.
attributes.background: We want Government to recognise the dedication and sacrifice made by  Front Line Staff managing and treating Covid-19 patients.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

A Campaign Medal should be stuck for all CORONAVIRUS Frontline workers.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566318

NHS staff should be awarded a service medal for working through covid-19.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560402
